item.title: SoFi 签订了高达 50 亿美元的贷款协议，金融科技借贷日渐兴盛
item.description: SoFi周四表示，它已与资产管理公司蓝猫资本（Blue Owl Capital）管理的基金敲定了一项高达50亿美元的协议，将在其金融应用程序上提供个人贷款。【原文：SoFi said on Thursday it has finalized an agreement of up to $5 billion with funds managed by asset manager Blue Owl Capital to provide personal loans on its finance app, highlighting the increasing shift of consumers from traditional banks to fintech lenders.】

item.title: 数据公布后，美联储有望在 6 月开始 2025 次降息
item.description: 周二，交易商押注美联储将在6月重启降息，因为政府数据显示美国上月生产者价格意外持平，每周申请失业救济人数下降。【原文：The Federal Reserve is seen restarting interest-rate cuts in June, traders bet on Tuesday, as government data showed U.S. producer prices were unexpectedly flat last month and weekly jobless claims fell.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"创纪录的燃料出口削弱了该组织的原油供应削减力度
item.description: 据行业数据和分析师称，"欧佩克+"的成品油出口量创下了历史新高，削弱了该组织原油产量限制的影响，因为包括沙特阿拉伯在内的成员国都在寻求提高收入和市场份额。【原文：OPEC+ has exported a record amount of refined products, blunting the impact of the group's crude output curbs, as members including Saudi Arabia, seek to boost their revenues and market share, according to industry data and analysts.】

item.title: 部长称意大利正在部分使馆测试星链（Starlink）天线
item.description: 意大利一位部长周四表示，意大利已在全球四个大使馆安装了星链（Starlink）天线，以测试其功能，但尚未与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的公司签署国家安全合同。【原文：Italy has installed Starlink antennas in four embassies around the world to test their functionality, but has not signed a national security contract with Elon Musk's company, a minister said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，劳动力市场保持稳定
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济的美国人数有所下降，但政府大幅削减开支和贸易战升级威胁着劳动力市场的稳定。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits fell last week, but sharp government spending cuts and an escalating trade war threaten labor market stability.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份生产者价格保持不变
item.description: 2 月份美国生产者价格意外持平，但降温趋势不太可能持续，因为进口关税预计将在未来几个月内提高商品价格。【原文：U.S. producer prices were unexpectedly unchanged in February, but the cooling trend is unlikely to be sustained as tariffs on imports are expected to raise prices of goods in the coming months.】

item.title: 多娜泰拉-范思哲卸任品牌创意总监一职
item.description: 范思哲的所有者卡普里控股公司（Capri Holdings）周四表示，多娜泰拉-范思哲将在担任范思哲品牌首席创意官近三十年后卸任。【原文：Donatella Versace is to step down as chief creative officer of the Versace brand after almost three decades in the role, owner Capri Holdings said on Thursday.】

item.title: Meta 将从 3 月 18 日起在美国测试社区笔记
item.description: Meta 公司周四表示，它将从 3 月 18 日起在美国的社交媒体平台上开始测试社区注释，而在此之前的两个月，它曾因保守派的多年批评而关闭了美国的事实核查项目。【原文：Meta said on Thursday it would begin testing community notes on its social media platforms in the United States from March 18, two months after shutting down its U.S. fact-checking program following years of criticism from conservatives.】

item.title: 如果欧盟不取消威士忌关税，特朗普威胁征收 200% 的葡萄酒关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，如果欧盟不取消对威士忌征收的关税，他将对所有从欧盟出口的葡萄酒和其他酒类产品征收 200% 的葡萄酒关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said that he would put a 200% wine tariff on all wines and other alcoholic products coming out of the European Union if the bloc did not remove its tariff on whiskey.】

item.title: 独家报道T. Rowe Price公司治理主管唐娜-安德森（Donna Anderson）将于年底退休
item.description: 唐娜-安德森（Donna Anderson）是 T. Rowe Price 公司的公司治理负责人，在投资界的一系列热点话题上颇有发言权，资产管理公司告诉路透社，她打算在今年年底退休。【原文：Donna Anderson, who heads corporate governance at T. Rowe Price and has been a powerful voice on a range of hot-button topics in the investment world, intends to retire at the end of this year, the asset manager told Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称贝莱德将任命俞培华为新任中国基金主管
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，贝莱德已聘请原安盛中国基金合资企业负责人俞蓓华担任其中国业务的新负责人，这家美国资产管理公司将继续对中国业务进行全面改革，以提高业绩。【原文：BlackRock has hired Yu Beihua, formerly head of AXA's China fund joint venture, as the new boss of its China business, two people with knowledge of the matter said, as the U.S. asset manager continues an overhaul of the unit to improve performance.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，瑞银考虑出售资产管理部门的部分房地产资产
item.description: 两位知情人士告诉路透社记者，瑞银集团正在考虑出售其资产管理部门的一部分业务，主要集中在房地产投资上，因为该行希望重整集团最小的业务部门。【原文：UBS is considering selling part of its asset management division that is largely focused on real estate investments, two people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters, as the bank looks to revamp the group's smallest business unit.】

item.title: 英特尔大涨 10%，新任首席执行官谭群钊为扭亏为盈带来 "立竿见影 "的效果
item.description: 华尔街分析师周四表示，即将上任的英特尔首席执行官陈立武将带来 "立竿见影的信誉"，这应有助于恢复投资者的信心，支持该公司努力成为一家主要的合约芯片制造商。【原文：Incoming Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan brings "instant credibility" that should help restore investor confidence and support the company's efforts to become a major contract chipmaker, Wall Street analysts said on Thursday.】

item.title: 芬兰政府提名芬兰银行行长连任
item.description: 芬兰政府周四表示，已提名芬兰银行行长奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）连任七年，为北欧国家总统的最终决定铺平了道路。【原文：Finland's government said on Thursday it has nominated Bank of Finland Governor Olli Rehn for a second seven-year term, paving the way for a final decision by the Nordic country's president.】

item.title: Blackstone 将以 1.34 亿美元收购印度 Kolte-Patil Developers 40% 的股份
item.description: 美国投资公司 Blackstone 周四表示，将收购印度房地产开发商 Kolte-Patil Developers 40% 的股份，交易价值为 116.7 亿卢比（1.34 亿美元）。【原文：U.S. investment firm Blackstone will purchase a 40% stake in Indian real estate developer Kolte-Patil Developers in a deal worth 11.67 billion rupees ($134 million), the latter said on Thursday.】

item.title: Blackstone 将以 1.34 亿美元收购印度 Kolte-Patil Developers 40% 的股份
item.description: 美国投资公司 Blackstone 周四表示，将收购印度房地产开发商 Kolte-Patil Developers 40% 的股份，交易价值为 116.7 亿卢比（1.34 亿美元）。【原文：U.S. investment firm Blackstone will purchase a 40% stake in Indian real estate developer Kolte-Patil Developers in a deal worth 11.67 billion rupees ($134 million), the latter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 印度阿波罗医院利用人工智能解决员工工作量问题
item.description: 印度阿波罗医院（Apollo Hospitals）的一位高层管理人员告诉路透社记者，该公司将加大对人工智能工具的投资，通过自动化日常工作（包括医疗文件）来减轻医生和护士的工作量。【原文：India's Apollo Hospitals will invest more in artificial intelligence tools to ease the workload for its doctors and nurses by automating routine tasks, including medical documentation, a top executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 法国反垄断机构批准家乐福收购德尔海兹法国业务
item.description: 法国反垄断机构周四表示，已批准家乐福收购路易-德尔海兹的法国业务，条件是将八家门店出售给竞争对手。【原文：French antitrust authority said on Thursday it had approved the acquisition by Carrefour of Louis Delhaize's French business on the condition that eight stores would be sold to competitors.】

item.title: 政府文件显示，小米电动跨界车 YU7 续航里程可达 770 公里
item.description: 周四的一份政府文件显示，中国科技公司小米的新款电动跨界 SUV YU7 的行驶里程将达到 770 公里（478 英里）。【原文：Chinese tech company Xiaomi 's new electric crossover SUV, the YU7, will have a driving range of up to 770 kilometres (478 miles), a government document showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 政府文件显示，小米电动跨界车 YU7 续航里程可达 770 公里
item.description: 周四的一份政府文件显示，中国科技公司小米的新款电动跨界 SUV YU7 的行驶里程将达到 770 公里（478 英里）。【原文：Chinese tech company Xiaomi 's new electric crossover SUV, the YU7, will have a driving range of up to 770 kilometres (478 miles), a government document showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 早间竞价贸易争端之后，市场开始关注政府停摆问题
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 美国初创企业 Flock Safety 筹集 2.75 亿美元，为生产工厂和研发提供资金
item.description: Flock Safety 是一家开发监控技术的美国初创公司，该公司向路透社透露，它已筹集到 2.75 亿美元的新资金，由 Andreessen Horowitz 领投，用于投资生产设施和扩展无人机产品。【原文：Flock Safety, a U.S. startup developing surveillance technology, has raised $275 million in new funding led by Andreessen Horowitz, as it invests in a manufacturing facility and expands into drone products, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国初创企业 Flock Safety 筹集 2.75 亿美元，为生产工厂和研发提供资金
item.description: Flock Safety 是一家开发监控技术的美国初创公司，该公司向路透社透露，它已筹集到 2.75 亿美元的新资金，由 Andreessen Horowitz 领投，用于投资生产设施和扩展无人机产品。【原文：Flock Safety, a U.S. startup developing surveillance technology, has raised $275 million in new funding led by Andreessen Horowitz, as it invests in a manufacturing facility and expands into drone products, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 巴克莱预计美国联储将在 6 月和 9 月两次降息
item.description: 华尔街券商巴克莱银行周四表示，目前预计美国联邦储备委员会将在6月和9月两次降息四分之一个百分点，理由是关税不确定性导致劳动力市场状况更加疲软。【原文：Barclays now expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to deliver two quarter-point interest rate cuts in June and September, the Wall Street brokerage said on Thursday, citing softer labor market conditions amid tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: Dollar General 预测年度可比销售额增长低于预期
item.description: 由于通胀率居高不下和经济不确定性影响了消费者支出，Dollar General 周四预计全年可比销售额的增长将大大低于预期。【原文：Dollar General on Thursday forecast annual comparable sales growth largely below estimates, as still-high inflation and economic uncertainty dent consumer spending.】

item.title: 制药商 Mallinckrodt 和 Endo 将以近 70 亿美元的交易合并
item.description: 曾共同面临美国阿片类药物诉讼的制药商 Mallinckrodt 和 Endo 已同意合并，交易价值近 70 亿美元。【原文：Mallinckrodt and Endo , drugmakers with a shared history of facing U.S. opioid litigation, have agreed to merge in a deal valued at nearly $7 billion.】

item.title: 政府拨款法案截止日期临近，经济增长担忧持续，期指下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货周四下跌，原因是投资者密切关注政府的临时拨款法案，同时对唐纳德-特朗普总统混乱的关税政策导致经济放缓的担忧不断升级。【原文：U.S. stock index futures declined on Thursday as investors closely monitored a stopgap government funding bill amid escalating slowdown fears driven by President Donald Trump's chaotic tariff policies.】

item.title: 独家报道花旗集团计划削减 IT 承包商，招聘员工以加强控制
item.description: 花旗集团计划大幅减少对信息技术承包商的依赖，并为信息技术部门招聘数千名员工，以应对监管部门对数据管理和控制缺陷的处罚。【原文：Citigroup plans to dramatically reduce its reliance on information technology contractors and hire thousands of employees for IT as the lender grapples with regulatory punishments over data governance and deficient controls.】

item.title: 以色列航空航天公司 2024 年销售额和利润在战争期间大幅增长
item.description: 国营以色列航空航天工业公司（IAI）（ISRAI.UL）报告 2024 年利润增长 55%，称这是其有史以来最好的一年，并称以色列军方和外国客户的销售都有所增长。【原文：State-run Israel Aerospace Industries (IAI) (ISRAI.UL) reported a 55% rise in profit for 2024, saying it was its best year ever and citing sales gains to both Israel's military and to foreign customers.】

item.title: 泰国商业团体敦促总理在担心关税的情况下与美国谈判
item.description: 在泰国政府与私营部门举行会议讨论美国贸易政策不确定性之际，一个泰国商业团体周四敦促泰国总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）与美国进行谈判，并考虑降低对美国商品的进口税。【原文：A Thai business group on Thursday urged Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra to negotiate with the United States and consider lowering import taxes on U.S. goods, as the government met with the private sector to discuss U.S. trade policy uncertainty.】
